verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

This shall be the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \w leper|strong="H6879"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w cleansing|strong="H2893"\w*: He shall be \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*; and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, \add if\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* be \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* in the \w leper|strong="H6879"\w*;

Then shall the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* to \w take|strong="H3947"\w* for him that is to be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w birds|strong="H6833"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w* \add and\add* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*, and \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and \w hyssop|strong="H0231"\w*:\f + \fr 14.4 \ft birds: or, sparrows\f*

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w command|strong="H6680"\w* that \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w birds|strong="H6833"\w* be \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* in an \w earthen|strong="H2789"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* over \w running|strong="H2416"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*:

As for the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w*, he shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* it, and the \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and the \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and the \w hyssop|strong="H0231"\w*, and shall \w dip|strong="H2881"\w* them and the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* in the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* \add that was\add* \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* over the \w running|strong="H2416"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*:

And he shall \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* upon him that is to be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* from the \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, and shall pronounce him \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*, and shall let the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* \w loose|strong="H7971"\w* into the \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.\f + \fr 14.7 \ft into…: Heb. upon the face of the field\f*

And he that is to be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w shave|strong="H1548"\w* off all his \w hair|strong="H8181"\w*, and \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* himself in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, that he may be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*: and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, and shall \w tarry|strong="H3427"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w* out of his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

But it shall be on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that he shall \w shave|strong="H1548"\w* all his \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* off his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* and his \w beard|strong="H2206"\w* and his \w eyebrows|strong="H1354"\w*, even all his \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* he shall \w shave|strong="H1548"\w* off: and he shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, also he shall \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and he shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

And on the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* he shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* he \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* ewe \w lamb|strong="H3535"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1323"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \add for\add* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w log|strong="H3849"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.\f + \fr 14.10 \ft of the…: Heb. the daughter of her year\f*

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* that maketh \add him\add* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w* shall \w present|strong="H5975"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that is to be made \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*, and those things, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* he \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, and \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* him for a trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*, and the \w log|strong="H3849"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w wave|strong="H5130"\w* them \add for\add* a wave \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

And he shall \w slay|strong="H7819"\w* the \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where he shall \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* and the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: for as the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \add is\add* the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w*, \add so is\add* the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*: it \add is\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add some\add* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*, and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w tip|strong="H8571"\w* of the \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* of him that is to be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w*, and upon the \w thumb|strong="H0931"\w* of his \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and upon the great \w toe|strong="H0931"\w* of his \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add some\add* of the \w log|strong="H3849"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \add it\add* into the \w palm|strong="H3709"\w* of his \w own|strong="H3548"\w* left \w hand|strong="H8042"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w dip|strong="H2881"\w* his \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* in the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* that \add is\add* in his \w left|strong="H8042"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*, and shall \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* of the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* with his \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

And of the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* that \add is\add* in his \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* shall the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* upon the \w tip|strong="H8571"\w* of the \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* of him that is to be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w*, and upon the \w thumb|strong="H0931"\w* of his \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and upon the great \w toe|strong="H0931"\w* of his \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, upon the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*:

And the \w remnant|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* he shall \w pour|strong="H5414"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of him that is to be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him that is to be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* from his \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w*; and \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* he shall \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him, and he shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

And if he \add be\add* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, and cannot \w get|strong="H3027"\w* so much; then he shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* \add for\add* a trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w* to be \w waved|strong="H8573"\w*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* tenth \w deal|strong="H6241"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and a \w log|strong="H3849"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*;\f + \fr 14.21 \ft cannot…: Heb. his hand reach not\f*\f + \fr 14.21 \ft to be…: Heb. for a waving\f*

And \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w turtledoves|strong="H8449"\w*, or \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*, such as he is able to \w get|strong="H3027"\w*; and the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* shall be a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

And he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them on the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* for his \w cleansing|strong="H2893"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*, and the \w log|strong="H3849"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w wave|strong="H5130"\w* them \add for\add* a wave \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

And he shall \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*, and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add some\add* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w tip|strong="H8571"\w* of the \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* of him that is to be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w*, and upon the \w thumb|strong="H0931"\w* of his \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and upon the great \w toe|strong="H0931"\w* of his \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*:
And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* of the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* into the \w palm|strong="H3709"\w* of his \w own|strong="H3548"\w* left \w hand|strong="H8042"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* with his \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* \add some\add* of the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* that \add is\add* in his \w left|strong="H8042"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* of the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* that \add is\add* in his \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* upon the \w tip|strong="H8571"\w* of the \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* of him that is to be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w*, and upon the \w thumb|strong="H0931"\w* of his \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and upon the great \w toe|strong="H0931"\w* of his \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, upon the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*:

And the \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* he shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of him that is to be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And he shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w turtledoves|strong="H8449"\w*, or of the \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*, such \w as|strong="H0834"\w* he can \w get|strong="H3027"\w*;

\add Even\add* such as \w he|strong="H3027"\w* is able to \w get|strong="H5381"\w*, the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \add for\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, with the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him that is to be \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

This \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \add of him\add* in whom \add is\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*, whose \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* is not able to \w get|strong="H5381"\w* \add that which pertaineth\add* to his \w cleansing|strong="H2893"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

When ye be \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, which I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to you for a \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, and I \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* in a \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of your \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*;

And he that owneth the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, It \w seemeth|strong="H7200"\w* to me \add there is\add* as it were a \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w command|strong="H6680"\w* that they \w empty|strong="H6437"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, before the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \add into it\add* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w*, that all that \add is\add* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* be not made \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*: and \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w go|strong="H0935"\w* in to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:\f + \fr 14.36 \ft empty: or, prepare\f*

And he shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w*, and, behold, \add if\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \add be\add* in the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* with hollow \w strakes|strong="H8258"\w*, \w greenish|strong="H3422"\w* or \w reddish|strong="H0125"\w*, which in \w sight|strong="H4758"\w* \add are\add* \w lower|strong="H8217"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*;

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w go|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* to the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* up the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w*: and, behold, \add if\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* be \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* in the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*;

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w command|strong="H6680"\w* that they \w take|strong="H2502"\w* away the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* in \w which|strong="H2004"\w* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \add is\add*, and they shall \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* them into an \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*:

And he shall cause the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* to be \w scraped|strong="H7106"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and they shall \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* out the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* that they \w scrape|strong="H7096"\w* off \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* into an \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*:

And they shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \add them\add* in the \w place|strong="H8478"\w* of those \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*; and he shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w morter|strong="H6083"\w*, and shall \w plaister|strong="H2902"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And if the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* come \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w break|strong="H6524"\w* out in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that he hath \w taken|strong="H2502"\w* away the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* he hath \w scraped|strong="H7096"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* it is \w plaistered|strong="H2902"\w*;

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w look|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, \add if\add* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* be \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, it \add is\add* a \w fretting|strong="H3992"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: it \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

And he shall break \w down|strong="H5422"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* of it, and the \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* thereof, and all the \w morter|strong="H6083"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and he shall carry \add them\add* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* into an \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

Moreover he that \w goeth|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* all the \w while|strong="H3117"\w* that it is \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* up shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* until the \w even|strong="H6153"\w*.

And he that \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*; and he that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*.

And if the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \add upon it\add*, and, behold, the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* hath not \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* was \w plaistered|strong="H2902"\w*: then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall pronounce the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*, because the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* is \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*.\f + \fr 14.48 \ft shall come…: Heb. in coming in shall come in, etc\f*

And he shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* to \w cleanse|strong="H2398"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w birds|strong="H6833"\w*, and \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and \w hyssop|strong="H0231"\w*:

And he shall \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w birds|strong="H6833"\w* in an \w earthen|strong="H2789"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* over \w running|strong="H2416"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*:

And he shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and the \w hyssop|strong="H0231"\w*, and the \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w*, and \w dip|strong="H2881"\w* them in the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w slain|strong="H7819"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w*, and in the \w running|strong="H2416"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*:

And he shall \w cleanse|strong="H2398"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* with the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w bird|strong="H6833"\w*, and with the \w running|strong="H2416"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and with the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w*, and with the \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and with the \w hyssop|strong="H0231"\w*, and with the \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*:

But he shall let \w go|strong="H7971"\w* the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* into the \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, and make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and it shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.
This \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* for all manner of \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*, and \w scall|strong="H5424"\w*,
And for the \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* of a \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, and of a \w house|strong="H1004"\w*,
And for a \w rising|strong="H7613"\w*, and for a \w scab|strong="H5597"\w*, and for a bright \w spot|strong="H0934"\w*:

To \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \add it is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, and \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \add it is\add* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*: this \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*.\f + \fr 14.57 \ft when it is unclean…: Heb. in the day of the unclean, and in the day of the clean\f*
